name: Odd Duck Media
description:
Odd Duck is more than just our name; it’s our philosophy on digital marketing. As former employees of “conventional” internet marketing firms, we aim to provide something better: an online marketing experience that genuinely cares for the needs of the client, their campaign success and the growth of their business.
We believe in doing what’s right for our clients (i.e., you and your business), even if it’s not what’s best for our bottom line. We’re young, we’re adventurous, and we’re ready to start putting our digital marketing expertise to work! We offer cutting-edge website design, high-end Search Engine Optimization (SEO), data-driven Pay-Per-Click Management, engaging Social Media Marketing and a ton of other services.
 
It’s not typical. It’s better – and that’s what makes us the Odd Ducks.
READ MORE...
